titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2160) making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1998, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-255, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2160. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The House shall be considered to have adopted the House Concurrent Resolution described in section 3 of the resolution.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 92.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 367 - 34 (Roll no. 490).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/18/1997--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2160 (Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs appropriations). Provides that the House shall be considered to have adopted a concurrent resolution barring the use of domestic food program or food stamp program funds under such Act for studies and evaluations.
